documents.document: Yes I have been on time for things before, when they started later than I thought.

[chimpanzee in heat sits down next to me at the bar]
Me: You look nice.
Her: Let's just be friends.
You kids are so spoiled, you don't know what it was like to suffer through the guacamole panic of 2017.
At least we'll have a nice wall to hurl ourselves off of.
By the time the mass deportations start we'll all be begging to get on the list.
Always kill the psychopath with superpowers.
I'm old enough to remember when nobody tweeted about politics. This place used to be nothing but jokes about celebrities, sex, and farts.
RIP old avi, thank you for your service. https://t.co/Vf3JjlrJzL

Why liberals lose 101:
Sat.-Liberals stage largest protest in U.S. history.
Mon.-500 articles by liberals on what was wrong with protest.
I will ignore every article of the constitution but my hands are completely tied by this audit you guys.
It took me twice as long as normal to get everything on my grocery list. I had to go to 3 different liquor stores.
There's a word for Republicans who actually know things, they're called Democrats.
If there's one thing I've learned so far in 2017 it's that I need to wear much tighter pants.
The fun thing about Alexa is how they programmed her with a massive inferiority complex and a bitter hatred for Siri.
I have the perfect skill set to be a motivational speaker, I just can't seem to make myself do it.
When the Repubs take away my health insurance I will protest by quietly dying.
It's a tough transition for the country to go from the president with the biggest dick to the one with the smallest.
The enemy of my enemy is also my enemy. I can have as many enemies as I want.
I like you, but not "I want to be snowed in with you" like you.
I swear, on my last grocery trip I bought all the healthy stuff.
Given the irrational fear it creates in Southerners, you'd think that snow is black.
2017 Goals: Be more like this kid... https://t.co/qhWjHTLeIT
If you really take the time to talk to them, old people are not that different from normal people.
@Jake_Vig @cvexland - Well this gets 2017 off to a great start! Thank you, kind sir.
Umm, maybe it was odd numbered years. https://t.co/7OzXgDR4EV
People in California think In-N-Out Burger is good because it's the only time they taste food with fat in it.
A few people on this site have real talent. Check out this vid of one who does. https://t.co/VnhfMNuR7u
Based on my email inbox I'm pretty sure Office Depot wants to fuck me.
I'm very classy for someone whose phone is held together with tape.
I don't think I can handle eleven more days of Christmas.
Mom said the only gift she wanted was for me to go to church with her. She didn't say I had to be sober.
There aren't any Christmas songs about getting stuck in holiday traffic for 2 hours on your way to work.
It's snowing in the Sahara Desert. And that doesn't even make the top 10 list of craziest shit that happened this year.
Of all the planets one could get marooned on the worst would be Planet Fitness.
Can't believe no one has thought to do a Spider-man reboot.
Thanks, grocery store check-out lady, for drawing a ðŸ™‚ on my receipt. But your coworker who drew ðŸ†ðŸ˜® is still my favorite.
Apparently the good people work out and get groceries on Sat. morning. I didn't even know the gym and grocery store were open then.

More true now than ever.
https://t.co/TeI3e66qig
Shopping at Costco as a single person is great because you go once and then you have a lifetime supply of everything.
Kirk Douglas just turned 100 years old. At this point he honestly can't remember whether or not he's Spartacus.
I don't wanna work. But banging on the drum all day seems exhausting.
Once Trump takes office all characters in books, TV, and movies who are secretly in love should just get it on before it's too late.
It takes a special kind of waiter to give bad service when I'm his only table.
Trying to negotiate friends with benefits arrangements almost makes me feel sorry for my insurance company.
Watching "Pretty Woman" and thinking how great life would be if 25 years ago Donald Trump had met a hooker with a heart of gold.
The best way to predict what my boss's top priority will be tomorrow is asking: what's today's lowest priority?
Sorry my jokes weren't as funny when I was happy.
I never go out in public with men who are more handsome than me. So what do you say, Todd, you want to grab a drink later.

Carrie Fisher: I fucked Harrison Ford while making Star Wars.
Mark Hamill: It was the 70s. I fucked 3 sand people, 2 jawas, and a droid.
A 55 year-old man played in a college football game last week. Doctors say his age will not limit his ability to get brain damage.
I'm just saying a billionaire who only cares about women as trophies should have a wife hotter than Melania.
My phone is about to die and I'm just like: same.
I will smoke a cigar tonight. It will either be a victory cigar or a might as well die of cancer cigar.
Trump's top advisor on African American affairs is Jim Croce's "Bad, Bad Leroy Brown".
You were sorely mistaken if you thought putting the brownies in the trash was going to keep me from eating them.

"It just seems like there aren't enough ways for people to feel rejected."
-Social media inventors
I can't be a politician. I like shaking hands with people but I could never kiss all those gross babies.
Now that Hilary Duff has apologized for her Halloween costume I can finally get some sleep.
There's a lot of money to be made by betting I will start singing the verse to "Hotel California" before the intro is over.
FB keeps pushing this article on me about awkward sex. Is their algorithm trying to tell me something? https://t.co/Ocyu2vIn93
I backed into a parking spot once. Luckily a friend knew the warning signs and staged an intervention before I went full douchebag.
If your sink is just a big bowl sitting on a cabinet then you can't get upset with me for eating cereal out of it.
That moment when you're watching Batman Begins and realize Ra's al Ghul's view of the world is essentially the same as Trump's.
1/3 of Americans would vote for a burlap sack with a dick taped to it over the most qualified woman in history, but it's not sexism at all.
I now hate anti-smoking ads more than I hate smoking. I would start smoking if it would stop the ads.
Update: Rich people still taking whatever they want from poor people.
Cyrano de Bergerac: inventor of catfishing.
Me: My gf and I argued earlier and when she came home her hair was 6 inches shorter. 911 Operator: Sir, get out of the house right now!
[After Sex] Me: Let's pretend this never happened. Her: I was only pretending that something did happen.
How many times do we have to go over it, ladies? You can have a hot guy OR a guy who's smart, funny, and interesting. Pick your poison.
There should be a "rhythmic" version of every Olympic event where people just do the sport badly while twirling a ribbon.
Always take time before an important business meeting to make sure your butt looks good.
CrossFit people tend to be a lot more cross than they are fit.
Well, you had a good run, Zuckerberg, sorry my aunts have now ruined Facebook for everyone.
When the NBC Olympic interviewer says "Congratulations on your bronze medal" she means "You are a national disgrace."
Rick, I don't think incense, wine, and candles even qualifies as freaky much less super freaky. It actually sounds quite nice.
I get sticking your key in her ignition but I don't understand how anything that happens is going to be similar to Murder, She Wrote.
We get it, Olympic athletes, you have nice bodies.
You can usually tell how important a conference call it is by whether or not I'm wearing pants.
They say the tv camera adds ten pounds. Apparently the internet adds thirty.
When you say you're not interested in being "politically correct" I think you mean "a decent human being."

"Have you ever heard the song, The Devil Went Down to Georgia?"
-Me, explaining how I got this solid gold kazoo.
I want all the comforts of modern life but with the abs of someone slowly starving to death in a medieval dungeon.
I know nobody has it all figured out but I thought by this point in life I'd at least have settled on a toilet paper brand.
People keep comparing Trump to Hitler and that's just so ridiculous and unfair. I mean, Hitler knew how to give a decent speech.
Hot girl (to my friend): You look just like someone I know! Me: Sorry, his wife doesn't allow him to look like someone you know.
PokÃ©mon GO seems fun but I worry what will happen when I need tech support and all the nerds are out roaming the countryside.
I've eaten two salads today so I guess my abs should be coming in any minute now.
Trump has definitely made things simpler by getting a lot of the racists to identify themselves with bright red hats.
I'm against capital punishment, unless you mean punishing people for tweeting in all caps, then I'm all for it.
Hey, EU, hang in there, bro. We've all been there. I find it helps to listen to "Black" by Pearl Jam on repeat for a few days.
Will I understand Europe descending into chaos part III if I haven't seen parts I and II?
The Olympic event I'm most looking forward to this summer is the Zika panic.
Heated conversation among millennials at the next table. At least it seems like it from the way they're furiously typing on their phones.
Is it still a catfish if she was only pretending to have a soul?
I will judge you by the worst picture in your profile but would prefer you judge me by the best pic in mine.
Even after the success of Hamilton no one is interested in my upbeat musical about Andrew Jackson and the trail of tears.
I think the friends I'm super mad at get the message when I write "Happy Birthday" on their FB walls instead of "Happy Birthday!"
My calorie counting app and I are not on speaking terms right now.
No, I don't think just because someone enjoys drinking alone in his tiny apartment all day he is necessarily an alcoholic.
